LanguageData.LingAbiBind.label: Bandaging
LanguageData.LingAbiBind.description: Immediately bandage up to 5 wounds on a target's body
LanguageData.LingAbiSexConversion.label: Sexual change
LanguageData.LingAbiSexConversion.description: Changing the gender of the other party is not valid for genderless creatures
LanguageData.LingAbiDamageTransfer.label: Damage Extraction
LanguageData.LingAbiDamageTransfer.description: Transfer all the wounds on the target's body to yourself
LanguageData.LingAbiDamageTransOtr.label: The gift of harm
LanguageData.LingAbiDamageTransOtr.description: Transfer all wounds from your own body to the target
LanguageData.LingAbiCorpseExplosion.label: Corpse explosion
LanguageData.LingAbiCorpseExplosion.description: Applies a corpse explosion status to the target, which will explode if the target dies within a day
LanguageData.LingAbiCharge.label: Recharge
LanguageData.LingAbiCharge.description: Increases the energy of the specified battery by 100W
LanguageData.LingAbiSkipAndBack.label: Blink
LanguageData.LingAbiSkipAndBack.description: Jump to the specified target and return to the original position after 1.5 seconds
LanguageData.LingAbiForRabbit.label: Transformation to rabbits
LanguageData.LingAbiForRabbit.description: Turn the target into a rabbit
LanguageData.LingAbiMadBeast.label: herd of animals
LanguageData.LingAbiMadBeast.description: Summon a horde of human-hunting beasts that do not discriminate between enemies
